titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide funds for administration of the earned income tax credit in Puerto Rico.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide funds for administration of the earned income tax credit in Puerto Rico.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: This bill provides funds for the administration of the earned income tax credit in Puerto Rico.
